title: I have to hand it to Riot
body: They make some freaking awesome music. I have not listened to a song they've made I have not like. Kindred's login is one of my favorites. So round of applause for whoever makes the music over at Riot. Keep up the good work.

replies.body: Thanks for your comments everyone! Everyone on the music team is very touched!
Props to Ed the Conqueror for having an amazing name. It must have had some context, and I'm kinda hoping it was for Ed, Edd, and Eddy? Maybe?

> [{quoted}](name=captainkaiger,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=cnrfJR4d,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-08T04:15:06.468+0000)
>
> Props to Ed the Conqueror for having an amazing name. It must have had some context, and I'm kinda hoping it was for Ed, Edd, and Eddy? Maybe?

Ha! It's actually from Edouard, my first name (French version of Edward).

Prepare for flame comments about music.
Incoming music qq threads.
If people complained about Fiora's hair....

Gj on the music though! It sounds amazing!
TO BRING BACK HOPE AND PEACE, RESTORE OUR GLORIA!!!

I re-watched the Amumu video again yesterday, and was blown away again by how well the song compliments the video. This song is also amazing on its own as well. I wonder if the instrumental version will ever be released....
They've got some music on Spotify I think :D
I miss the vi song about flipping tables
Soundcloud is your friend, my friend. Pretty much all of the logins are there

I don't normally listen to the music, but someone posted it from PBE.  It's very good and I'm excited to see the live login screen in 5.20.

The login screens have really gotten far better from an art and sound standpoint.  I loved the GP for the style.  The animation of Yi was really cool.  The music for Kindred will prob be the biggest accomplishment.  All of them were very cool in very different ways.
Quinn and Valor's theme is the best. Riots music team is one of the best in the video game industry.
